name: Create a new user in a list in Iterable from a new LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submission
description:
Every time a new lead is generated in LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms, a new user will be instantly added to a list in Iterable.

The template expects your LinkedIn form to collect at least:
1) Email
2) First Name
3) Last Name

The template also expects your Iterable list to have these fields:
1) email
2) name
